item.title: CVE-2024-35166|2024-05-13T09:09:42.050Z -- Ninja Team -- Filebird
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Ninja Team Filebird.This issue affects Filebird: from n/a through 5.6.3.
